H0.text: Mary Arden had a famous son. Who was he. Christopher Marlowe

H1.text: Mary Arden had a famous son. Who was he. Ben Jonson

H2.text: Mary Arden had a famous son. Who was he. John Donne

H3.text: Mary Arden had a famous son. Who was he. Shakspeare

A4.text: Shakespeare was the son of John Shakespeare, an alderman and a successful glover (gloveâ€‘maker) originally from Snitterfield in Warwickshire, and Mary Arden, the daughter of an affluent landowning family.

A5.text: Ben Jonson was a former rival of Shakespeare.
